identity: Believed fictional by general Earth populace
knownrelatives: Buri (Tiwaz, great-grandfather); Bor (grandfather, deceased); Vili (father, deceased); Odin, Ve (uncles, deceased); Balder, Hermod, Thor, Tyr, Vidar (cousins); Loki (step-cousin); Mimir (granduncle)
powers: As well as possessing the superhuman abilities shared by all the Gods of Asgard, such as superhuman strength enabling him to lift 20 tons, Hoder can also receive visions of a far distant future or of events that will occur in other realities.
